metadata.description: SPIN2/PASM2 code completion definitions for IDE integration

keywords.label: ABORT
keywords.detail: Abort method execution with optional error value

keywords.label: BYTE
keywords.detail: 8-bit unsigned integer type (0-255)

keywords.label: BYTEFIT
keywords.detail: Expression that fits in a byte constant

keywords.label: CASE
keywords.detail: Multi-way branch based on expression value

keywords.label: CASE_FAST
keywords.detail: Optimized case statement for sequential values

keywords.label: CON
keywords.detail: Constants section - defines named constant values

keywords.label: DAT
keywords.detail: Data section - contains data and inline assembly

keywords.label: ELSE
keywords.detail: Default case in IF statement

keywords.label: ELSEIF
keywords.detail: Additional condition in IF statement chain

keywords.label: ELSEIFNOT
keywords.detail: Additional negative condition in IF statement chain

keywords.label: FILE
keywords.detail: Include file contents as data

keywords.label: FROM
keywords.detail: Starting value for counted loop
examples: REPEAT i FROM 1 TO 10\n  sum += i

keywords.label: IF
keywords.detail: Conditional execution based on boolean expression

keywords.label: IFNOT
keywords.detail: Conditional execution when condition is false

keywords.label: LONG
keywords.detail: 32-bit signed integer type (-2147483648 to 2147483647)

keywords.label: LOOKDOWN
keywords.detail: Find index of value in table (1-based result)

keywords.label: LOOKDOWNZ
keywords.detail: Find index of value in table (0-based result)

keywords.label: LOOKUP
keywords.detail: Look up value in table (1-based indexing)

keywords.label: LOOKUPZ
keywords.detail: Look up value in table (0-based indexing)

keywords.label: NEXT
keywords.detail: Continue to next loop iteration

keywords.label: OBJ
keywords.detail: Object section - declares child objects

keywords.label: OTHER
keywords.detail: Default case in CASE statement

keywords.label: PRI
keywords.detail: Private method declaration - internal to object only

keywords.label: PUB
keywords.detail: Public method declaration - visible to parent objects

keywords.label: QUIT
keywords.detail: Exit current loop

keywords.label: REPEAT
keywords.detail: Loop construct with various forms

keywords.label: RETURN
keywords.detail: Return from method with optional value(s)

keywords.label: STEP
keywords.detail: Increment value for counted loop
examples: REPEAT i FROM 0 TO 100 STEP 5\n  process(i)

keywords.label: STRING
keywords.detail: String constant declaration

keywords.label: TO
keywords.detail: Ending value for counted loop

keywords.label: UNTIL
keywords.detail: Continue loop until condition becomes true

keywords.label: VAR
keywords.detail: Variables section - declares variables for the object

keywords.label: WHILE
keywords.detail: Continue loop while condition is true

keywords.label: WITH
keywords.detail: Loop variable declaration in REPEAT

keywords.label: WORD
keywords.detail: 16-bit unsigned integer type (0-65535)

keywords.label: WORDFIT
keywords.detail: Expression that fits in a word constant

operators.label: BMASK
operators.detail: Create bit mask from bit count (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: DECOD
operators.detail: Decode bit position to mask (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: ENCOD
operators.detail: Encode highest bit position (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: ONES
operators.detail: Count number of 1 bits (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: REV
operators.detail: Reverse bits in specified width (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: SAR
operators.detail: Arithmetic right shift - sign extending (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: SIGNX
operators.detail: Sign extend to specified bit width (also PASM2 instruction)

operators.label: ZEROX
operators.detail: Zero extend to specified bit width (also PASM2 instruction)
Force value to be at least minimum
Force value to be at most maximum

operators.label: ADDBITS
operators.detail: Add bit count to pin number

operators.label: ADDPINS
operators.detail: Add pin count to pin number
Unsigned less than or equal comparison
Unsigned greater than or equal comparison
Signed less than or equal comparison
Floating point less than or equal comparison
Signed greater than or equal comparison
Floating point greater than or equal comparison

examples: a :=: b  // swap values of a and b

functions.label: BYTECOMP
functions.detail: Complement bytes within a long value

functions.label: BYTEMOVE
functions.detail: Copy bytes from source to destination

functions.label: BYTESWAP
functions.detail: Swap bytes within a long value

functions.label: COGINIT
functions.detail: Start a cog with specified program and parameter

functions.label: DECOD
functions.detail: Decode bit position to bit mask

functions.label: ENCOD
functions.detail: Encode highest bit position (32 if zero)

functions.label: EXP
functions.detail: e raised to the power of value

functions.label: EXP10
functions.detail: 10 raised to the power of value

functions.label: EXP2
functions.detail: 2 raised to the power of value

functions.label: GETRND
functions.detail: Get random number from hardware generator

functions.label: LONGMOVE
functions.detail: Copy longs from source to destination

functions.label: LOOKUP
functions.detail: Look up value in table using 1-based indexing

functions.label: LOOKUPZ
functions.detail: Look up value in table using 0-based indexing

functions.label: ONES
functions.detail: Count number of 1 bits in value

functions.label: PINSTART
functions.detail: Start smart pin with specified mode and parameters

functions.label: POW
functions.detail: Raise base to the power of exponent

functions.label: ROUND
functions.detail: Round floating point to nearest integer

functions.label: WAITCT
functions.detail: Wait until system counter reaches specified value

functions.label: WORDCOMP
functions.detail: Complement words within a long value

functions.label: WORDMOVE
functions.detail: Copy words from source to destination

functions.label: WORDSWAP
functions.detail: Swap words within a long value
